release.change: Breaking Change: BLE Transmitter and Beacon Monitor sensor now report beacon attributes in "UUID_Major_Minor" format.
Breaking Change: Only update Geocoded Location sensor with location updates, if the new setting is enabled.
Breaking Change: Add Bluetooth Connect permission to Beacon Monitor sensor for Android 12+.
Add dynamic color sensor for supported devices
Add support for considering WiFi BSSID as Home WiFi
Add support for intent scheme URI and app deep links in notification clickAction and actions
Allow intents registered under Last Update sensor to contain categories (if the intent requires them)
Add notification commands to control Screen Brightness Level and Automatic Screen Brightness
Add force_on and force_off commands to High Accuracy notification command to allow control with constraints
Show custom icon on Device Controls, if available
Combine theme option Follow Home Assistant into Follow System Settings
Bug fixes, performance improvements, design tweaks and dependency updates
